Name: ZenFarm
About the game: / / Relax and farm in the perfect world inside of ZenFarm game. Zen is for finding inner piece and harmony during your hard days in this beautiful farming game. Find your ZEN during farming! Welcome to ZenFarm - game with relaxing music and farming gameplay. Start building your farm from growing seeds to building special places for your animals. Don't forget to decorate your farm with many items as well! Features: - Gardening - Breeding - Cropping - Building factories - Awesome relaxing music - Beautiful environment - Family friendly for all ages - Many cool elements for decoration - SUPER EASY AND RELAX!
